data.client_settings: Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 28393, Version Hash: 1e9119edf9c09e7b9ce4a7db57acbdfced047df9.
data.actual_result: Desktop client does not animate the PNG unless opening original
data.expected_result: PNG should be animated in both clients
data.short_description: Animated PNGs display differently between Desktop and Web clients. Output by both clients should be consistent.
data.steps_to_repro: - Upload an Animated PNG - Open the Channel/PM the APNG was uploaded to on both desktop and web - Compare
